MemberSignature.Value: public bool AllowNtlm { get; }
.property instance bool AllowNtlm
Public ReadOnly Property AllowNtlm As Boolean
public: property bool AllowNtlm { bool get(); };

Docs.summary: Gets a value that indicates whether to allow NTLM authentication.
Docs.value: if NTLM authentication is allowed; otherwise, .

remarks.format:
## Remarks Setting this property to `true` allows authentication to downgrade to NTLM if Kerberos is not available.
Setting this property to `false` causes Windows Communication Foundation (WCF) to make a best-effort to throw an exception if NTLM is used. Note that setting this property to `false` may not prevent NTLM credentials from being sent over the wire.
